data.meta_description: Learn about Juhi Chaturvedi on AppleÂ TV. Browse shows and movies that include Juhi Chaturvedi, such as Piku and Vicky Donor.
data.text: Juhi Chaturvedi is an Indian screenwriter who works in Hindi films. An advertising professional based in Mumbai, Chaturvedi has written scripts for Bollywood films Vicky Donor, Piku, October and Gulabo Sitabo. She won the 2013 Filmfare Award for Best Story for Vicky Donor, the National Film Award for Best Original Screenplay and Best Dialogues and the 2016 Filmfare Award for Best Screenplay for Piku.
